As executive chairman, Eric Schmidt will handle deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. In a blog posting, Eric Schmidt wrote,`` as Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' noting that Google recognized a need to`` speed up decision making.

Google Inc. 's investors believed the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said.
